 Nightstrike::
 
Nightstrike avoided the shots and shot against Dark rat 14 times with his Assault Machine Gun.
  Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@...> wrote: 5 of the shots hit him. when he gets up he uses an ice blaster

> Nightstrike::
>
